title: Kangalae Kamalalayam Lyrics Bale Pandiya
stanzas:
Kangale Kamalalayam
kanavugal ingae
alai pol varum.(2)

alaigalile naan midhanthaen
anu anuvaai enai izhanthaen.
izhandha kaalam enai thuraththa
iniya kaalam ennai anaikka.

enna seivaen
naan enna seivaen.
mayangidum Kangale
Kamalalayam

kanavugal kandu
naan ezhundhaen.
iru karuvizhi theendi
naan vizhunthaen.

solla ninaithaen
vendaam endru
solli mudithaen
aamaam endru.

iravu mudinthum
poga marukkum
iniya nilavae.

nilavugal thuraththta
naan nadanthaen.
un ninaivugal thadukki
naan vizhunthaen.

unnai andri yaarai
ninaippen
urugum uyirai engu
pudhaippen.

kaalai vandhum
kalaiya marukkum
iniya kanave.

kanavugal ingae
alai pol varum
